snippet: Transportation authority officials said the whole card, except for the black stripe, would be available to marketers in a move to raise much-needed revenue.
abstract: Metropolitan Transportation Authority announces a plan to offer advertising space on the front of its New York City MetroCards in an effort to raise much-needed revenue; officials say the entire card, except for the black stripe on the back, will be available to marketers.
lead_paragraph: Transportation authority officials said the whole card, except for the black stripe, would be available to marketers in a move to raise much-needed revenue.

headline.seo: M.T.A. Opens Front of MetroCard to Advertising
headline.main: M.T.A. Opens Front of MetroCard to Advertising
headline.print_headline: For Transit Agency Needing Cash, This Ride on the No. 7 Line Is Sponsored By ...
